Text: Japanese Upper House Election Result Report Cc nicholaso Dear Steve Please find enclosed a note on the results of the Upper House election held here in Japan on July In a nutshell there were no real surprises The ruling coalition achieved a comfortable majority of seats for a total of seats in the seat chamber Id be happy to put together a more detailed analysis if needed Yours Llewelyn Hughes Public and Regulatory Affairs Enron Japan Ph

Political Update from Enron Japan July Cc nicholaso enclosed the political roundup for July covering the followi ng issues Brief on USJapan Summit LDP success in local elections augur well for Koizumi agenda I hope that it is useful to you Llewelyn Hughes Public Regulatory Affairs Enron Japan

Political and Regulatory Update from Enron Japan October Please find enclosed the political and regulatory roundup for October In recognition of the METI announcement that the electricity reform committee will begin deliberations on November th the newsletter will cover regulatory developments in energy policy in addition to national political issues starting from this edition Contents Antiterrorist bill consumes parliamentary session Supplementary budget issues next on agenda Energy Deregulation a Electricity Reform Committee to start deliberations November b Environment Ministry opens committee to discuss merits of carbon tax Llewelyn Hughes Public and Regulatory Affairs Enron Japan Ph
